name: Proof_345 — Morning Interaction With the Last Remaining Duck MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a morning human–animal interaction at MaMeeFarm, recorded on 17 December 2025 at 07:50 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee sitting inside the duck coop, interacting calmly with the single remaining duck. Feeding containers are visible, and the duck appears physically active and alert. On this morning, no egg was produced, despite the duck showing no visible signs of illness or distress.

This record captures both presence and absence: the presence of life, care, and interaction, alongside the absence of expected production output. Such dual documentation is essential for maintaining integrity in real-world livestock data.

The observation is recorded as-is, without interpretation or projection, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth documentation, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The embedded timestamp in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.

This proof is prepared for minting as part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
